word:
A Part of an Adequate Diet 

                                              (1905) M.H. 296 
     471. Grains, fruits, nuts, and vegetables constitute the diet chosen for us by our Creator. These foods prepared in as simple and natural a manner as possible, are the most healthful and nourishing. They impart a strength, a power of endurance, and a vigor of intellect, that are not afforded by a more complex and stimulating diet. 
     [FRUITS, GRAINS, VEGETABLES WITH MILK AND CREAM, THE MOST HEALTHFUL DIET--487] 
     [VEGETABLES ON E. G. WHITE'S TABLE--APPENDIX I:4, 8, 15]
